ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Absorption by partially ionized material with large velocity shear. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A model to fit the soft excess in AGN by partially ionized absorbing material with large velocity shear. It approximates this by using XSTAR kn5 photoionization absorption model grids (calculated assuming a microturbulent velocity of 100km/s), and then convolving this with Gaussian smearing. This is the model used by Gierlinski & Done 2006, Sobolewska & Done 2006 and Done et al 2006. It is an update (uses a newer version of XSTAR) of the original model of Gierlinski & Done 2004.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: equivalent hydrogen column (in units of 10^22 atoms/cm^2)

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.
